DataElement.preferredName: Oral Indication Medication Condition Additional Training and Education Training and Education Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Oral; of, or relating to, or affecting, or for use in the mouth._A sign, signal, circumstance, or symptom which serves to indicate or point out the cause, pathology, treatment, or issue of an attack of disease; the basis for initiation of a treatment for a disease or of a diagnostic test (causal, or symptomatic, or disease-specific indication)._biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products._A state of being, such as a state of health._Added; extra. (from American Heritage Dictionary)_To teach theory and hands on experience__To teach theory and hands on experience_An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

(from American Heritage Dictionary)_To teach theory and hands on experience_

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Oral; of, or relating to, or affecting, or for use in the mouth.:A sign, signal, circumstance, or symptom which serves to indicate or point out the cause, pathology, treatment, or issue of an attack of disease; the basis for initiation of a treatment for a disease or of a diagnostic test (causal, or symptomatic, or disease-specific indication).:biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products.:A state of being, such as a state of health.

Concepts.definition: Of, or relating to, or affecting, or for use in the mouth.

A sign, signal, circumstance, or symptom which serves to indicate or point out the cause, pathology, treatment, or issue of an attack of disease; the basis for initiation of a treatment for a disease or of a diagnostic test (causal, or symptomatic, or disease-specific indication).

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
A state of being, such as a state of health.

Property.preferredDefinition: Added; extra. (from American Heritage Dictionary):To teach theory and hands on experience

Concepts.definition: To teach theory and hands on experience

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Which response best represent
ReferenceDocuments.description: Which response best represents the desire you have to receive additional training in the following areas: Complex oral indications of specific conditions and medications?
